name: Philae (usernameHed)
description:
Philae is a Mario Galaxy like CCC, with a far more complexe physics system.

For now, this is only a playground with a lot of gravity testing and experimentation. Warning though: the camera is temporary, I suggest peaple with Simulation sickness to avoid to play or watch for now.

See the Devlog, video and other stuff in my portfolio:

http://www.belfiore.ovh/create/portfolio-philae.php
